## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/gdbjitdebuginforegistrationplugin">GDBJITDebugInfoRegistrationPlugin</a></>}>
For each object containing debug info, installs JITLink passes to synthesize a debug object and then register it via the GDB JIT-registration interface. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/gdbjitdebuginforegistrationplugin/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
